description: A person within the Star Wars universe
title: People

___birth_year.description: The birth year of this person. BBY (Before the Battle of Yavin) or ABY (After the Battle of Yavin).

___species.description: The url of the species resource that this person is.

___eye_color.description: The eye color of this person.

___homeworld.description: The url of the planet resource that this person was born on.

___mass.description: The mass of this person in kilograms.

___gender.description: The gender of this person (if known).

___skin_color.description: The skin color of this person.

___vehicles.description: An array of vehicle resources that this person has piloted

___hair_color.description: The hair color of this person.

___starships.description: An array of starship resources that this person has piloted

___films.description: An array of urls of film resources that this person has been in.

___height.description: The height of this person in meters.
